name: ripplet.js
description: Fully controllable vanilla-js material design ripple effect generator

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build:umd && npm run build:es && npm run build:demo
scripts.build:umd: npm run build:umd:types && npm run build:umd:main && npm run build:umd:declarative
scripts.build:umd:main: rollup -c -n ripplet -i src/ripplet -o umd/ripplet.js && uglifyjs -m -c join_vars=true -o umd/ripplet.min.js umd/ripplet.js
scripts.build:umd:declarative: rollup -c -n ripplet -i src/ripplet-declarative -o umd/ripplet-declarative.js && uglifyjs -m -c join_vars=true -o umd/ripplet-declarative.min.js umd/ripplet-declarative.js
scripts.verify: npm run verify:install && npm run verify:build && npm run verify:open
scripts.verify:build: npm run verify:clean && subpkg run build
